page.title: 04Worship at Holcot Church
page.content: A Eucharist is celebrated every Sunday at 11.15 am. The{maximum congregation averages{20 people.}This number represents about 5% of the total village population. Everyone in the congregation is over the age of fifty years. As there is{no organist,}all hymns are sung unaccompanied. There is in fact no provision at all for children in the worship at the church and no Sunday School. Lay people take no part in the services which are held. There are no house groups or other weekday activities connected with the church. Once a year, a{fete}is arranged to raise funds for the building's maintenance and upkeep.
